question.questionTextM: While the HAPSITE loop method is running, you should continue with other sampling. Put the steps in the correct order of execution.
question.questionTextL: While the HAPSITE loop method is running, the Bio-1 Alpha BEs should continue with other sampling. Put the steps in the correct order of execution.
question.instructionText: Drag each layer name in the right and place it besides its correct description. When you are done, click Submit.

drag_options.drag_option: Remove scoops and swabs from Quicksilver Kit
